title: Fresh Made all,day everyday
caption: Good bread consists of five ingredients: flour, water, salt, levain and a lot of passion. We produce bread of exceptional quality because we respect the need for a long fermentation process.

title: Delicious and healthy fast food
caption: It's this easy. Just call ahead and tell us what you like and we'll give you a time when it willbe ready for you tocome in and pickup. Call 610-687-1575 or you can ORDER ONLINE for pick-up.
